trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Lansdale
There was one other sighting in Lansdale on or around January 22nd 1996
Summary: I saw a hovering object with yellow & orange blinking lights in my backyard
divs: Sighting DetailsEvery night after I use the bathrooom, I always look out my back window into my backyard. At approx 5:00AM-- what I saw was so amazing I woke up my children - (then 14 & 11) andcalled my next door neighbors. About 30 feet beyond my window there are many trees-in a wooded area--I saw a hovering disc shaped object with orange & yellow blinking lights. It seemed to be scanning the ground. There were also yellow blinking lights going back & forth in about a 10 yard stretch from my neighbors property to mine. This entire episode lasted about an hour until daybreak -then either it disappeared or was not visible. I called my local police to see if anyone else reported this siting-they said no. But 2 officers came over to my house & looked around but saw nothing--The next day my neighbor & I walked into the woods where I had seen the siting & again there was no indication of anything being there where I saw it. I was constantly being teased for what I saw --like I made it up --but to this day I still have a very vivid memory of that startling experience. And I do believe it was something that cannot be explained.. I feel very fortunate to have witnessed such an extradinary site. It gives me the chills when I recall the episode.
